TraitDef.label: Khajiit Natural Agility
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit possesses the natural agility and stealth of their feline heritage, along with keen night vision and nimble fingers.

li.label: Feline Grace
li.description: Born with the natural agility of the cat-folk, this pawn excels in stealth, movement, and fine manipulation.

TraitDef.label: Argonian Adaptation
TraitDef.description: This Argonian possesses the natural adaptations of the lizard-folk, including resistance to disease and superior swimming abilities.

li.label: Hist-Born
li.description: Born under the blessing of the Hist, this pawn has enhanced resistance to disease and natural healing abilities.

TraitDef.label: Breton Magic Resistance
TraitDef.description: This Breton possesses the natural magic resistance and intellect of their mixed elven-human heritage.

li.label: Dragonskin
li.description: Born with natural magic resistance and enhanced intellect from their mixed heritage.

TraitDef.label: Nord Resilience
TraitDef.description: This Nord possesses the natural hardiness and combat prowess of the northern warriors of Skyrim.

li.label: Nordic Steel
li.description: Born in the harsh lands of Skyrim, this pawn has enhanced cold resistance and natural combat abilities.

TraitDef.label: Redguard Warrior Spirit
TraitDef.description: This Redguard possesses the natural warrior traditions and desert adaptations of Hammerfell.

li.label: Sword-Singer
li.description: Born with the warrior traditions of Hammerfell, this pawn excels in combat and desert survival.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Diplomacy
TraitDef.description: This Imperial possesses the natural leadership and diplomatic skills that built the Empire.

li.label: Voice of the Emperor
li.description: Born with the diplomatic traditions of Cyrodiil, this pawn excels in social situations and leadership.
